alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Logan; Pope; Searcy; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:00PM CDT until March 31 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOGAN...SOUTHWESTERN SEARCY...SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON...WEST CENTRAL VAN BUREN AND NORTHERN POPE COUNTIES... At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holman, or 8 miles east of Clarksville, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lamar... Dover... Knoxville... Hector... Broomfield... Solo... Smyrna... Holman... Lake Dardanelle... Ben Hur... Brock Creek Campground... Augsburg... Lutherville... Long Pool Campground... Piney Bay Recreation Area... Nogo... Treat... Pleasant Valley in Pope County... Mountain Man Trailhead... Scottsville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western, central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson; Logan; Pope; Searcy; Van Buren
